instructions.title: Tap to Smash
instructions.description: Simply tap on your target to unleash your feline paw's destructive power. One tap, one smash!
instructions.tip: Start with easy targets to get the hang of the controls!

instructions.title: Aim with Precision
instructions.description: Take your time to aim carefully at your targets. Precision is key to successful destruction!
instructions.tip: Look for the best angle to hit multiple targets!

instructions.title: Avoid Traps
instructions.description: Watch out for dangerous traps and obstacles that can end your destruction spree early.
instructions.tip: Plan your moves carefully to avoid getting trapped!

instructions.title: Use Power-ups
instructions.description: Collect special power-ups that enhance your paw's destructive abilities and help you clear levels faster.
instructions.tip: Power-ups can turn the tide in difficult situations!

instructions.title: Progress Through Levels
instructions.description: Complete each level by destroying all targets to unlock the next challenge with increased difficulty.
instructions.tip: Each level brings new challenges and opportunities!

instructions.title: Master the Paw
instructions.description: Practice your timing and accuracy to become the ultimate feline destroyer and achieve high scores!
instructions.tip: The more you play, the better you'll become at smashing!
